name: Circe
description:
Humanity has discovered something in the sky. We are not alone. Monsters that cannot be killed by any known weapon. And 2 dead warriors. Archer Ray and Sorcerer Magie. Scientists combined these two bodies to win against monsters. But it didn't work, the body wasn't living. After a long time, the body awoke, but only a vengeance remained from humanity. 

Controllers:

Move: WASD

Right Dash: E

Left Dash: Q

Backward Dash: F

Use Potion: Z

Use Dark Magic: X

Character Swap: 1, 2
